full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
APN- BASE PROGRAM – NORTHERN CANADA

## Tender Information

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01011705

#### Amendment Number
1

#### Solicitation Number
APN-MPYK2022

#### Publication Date
2022-10-28

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-03-29T14:00:00

#### Amendment Date
2023-03-02

## Contract Information

#### Program Description
The Advance Procurement Notice (APN) is for potential contracts with anticipated security requirements to provide interested consultants and contractors an opportunity to begin the sponsorship request process for obtaining the required security clearance(s).

#### Services Included
The contracts may include, but are not limited to:

* Architectural and Engineering Services
* Mechanical Services
* General Structural Works
* Electrical Services
* Fire Alarm, Detection, Suppression and Protection Systems
* General Contractor Services

#### Required Security Clearances
Consultants and Contractors are required to hold a valid and active DESIGNATED ORGANIZATION SCREENING (DOS) granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Industrial Security Program (ISP) Sponsorship.

## Anticipated Solicitations

#### Contract Number
MPYK0013_79906

#### Title/Description
440 Sqn Roof Replacement, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories

#### Approximate Estimate
$2,750,000

#### Anticipated Posting Date
2022-03-28

## Contract Award and Security Requirements

#### Eligibility
Consultants and Contractors are required to actively hold all required security clearance(s) at the time of closing, as detailed in the solicitation tender documents.

## Sponsorship Process

#### Application Process
Consultants and Contractors can begin the sponsorship request process by submitting a sponsorship request application to Defence Construction Canada (DCC) through their website.

#### Required Information
Consultants and Contractors must provide the following information:

* Contract number as referenced in the table above
* Level of clearance requested to be sponsored for

#### Processing Timeline
DCC will review the sponsorship request application and communicate directly with the consultant or contractor to complete a sponsorship request package. Once the package is substantially complete, DCC will forward it to the CSP, PWGSC on behalf of the consultant or contractor within 30 days prior to planned solicitation/tender closing. Please note that there is no guarantee of success or timely processing of the sponsorship request
